meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Arnold Dean Amanda Potter John Anneken Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6599.

td.p: Arnold Dean, a lawyer from Arlington, Virginia
Amanda Potter, a museum educator originally from Glens Falls, New York
John Anneken, a postdoctoral researcher from Cincinnati, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,911)

tr.td: TO THE POLICE STATION!
TV SUPPORTING CASTS
NAVAL VESSELS
TABLE OF CONDIMENTS
MLB TEAM NAMES?
THINGS MOTHER GAVE US
(Alex: Each correct response will be made up of the letters in the word "mother." Not all of them, necessarily.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
